report.title: Find duplicate names
report.description: Finds a count locations for the same website/location type/name combination, to assist UI allowing warning user before creating a duplicate.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND trim(l.name) ilike trim('#name#') AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND #website_filter#

param.name: name
param.description: Location name to search for duplicates of.

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Location_type_id to include in the search for duplicates.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: exclude_location_id
param.description: Location ID to exclude in the search for duplicates - set to the current location ID when editing so the current location isn't checked.
